message: Here's a space to talk about your favorite Fox sci-fi show.  Just give spoiler warnings and use a hashtag to specify the episode that you're discussing.
I love this show.  First season was shaky, but then it just kept getting better!

I really need to get more involved with this show - a bunch of my friends love it and the concept is awesome! Do you guys like the supernatural aspect or the thriller-esque-edge-of-your-seat aspect more?
I'm into the supernatural, fringe science aspect of the show. I think if you were a fan of early X-Files, you'll enjoy Fringe.
Good news, Fringe fans!  The show's been renewed for a fourth season! http://insidetv.ew.com/2011/03/24/fringe-renewed-for-fourth-season/
It is great news and I must like to watch the entire season truly.
